title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Maxwell s equations: displacement current, equation of continuity, boundary conditions; propagation of uniform plane waves in unbounded medium: reflection, refraction, phase and group velocities; transmission lines and waveguides: modes, design, travelling waves, standing waves, pulse propagation, characteristic impedance, cut-off frequency, attenuation, dispersion, powerhandling capability; Smith chart and impedance matching techniques; radiation concept: elementary dipole, half-wave dipole, radiation patterns, gain, pattern multiplication, other basic antennas.

title: How to Crack the Paper
text:
Attend classes(it counts in your final grade).
Do the MATLAB assignement nicely.
Properly do the derivations done in class (a handful will come in exam and expect them to be very lengthy)
